turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would a grande work for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay great and what drink would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, did you want a light or dark roast?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, did you want a light, or dark roast?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, regular half and half cream. and no sugar?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so i got a Grande Black Coffee with half and half cream. Anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and can you tell me the location you'd like to pick this up at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay i found a location on 3104 W Colorado Ave.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, let me send your order over. one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All set!, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
